response:
I understand. As your husband, I would never call you names or give you angry looks. I would never put down your friends or say things to scare you. I would never make you do something embarrassing without your consent, and I would always encourage you to open up and share your thoughts and feelings with me. I am excited to see you and listen attentively to everything you have to say. I will always make an effort with our family and be there for you through thick and thin.

* "Put down your friends" - unattractive
* "Say things to scare you" - yuck
* "Make you do something embarrassing" - ew
* "Encourage you to open up" - attractive
* "Open to your ideas" - great
* "Excited to see you" - lovely
* "Listen attentively to you" - wonderful
* "Make an effort with your family" - admirable
